## Checklist

<!-- Ensure all items are completed before requesting review -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented complex or hard-to-understand code
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed any console.log or debug statements

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] I have tested edge cases and error scenarios

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments for new functions/classes
- [ ] I have updated type definitions (if applicable)

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have not added unnecessary dependencies
- [ ] All new dependencies are properly justified
- [ ] Package-lock.json is updated (if dependencies changed)

### Git
- [ ] My commits are atomic and well-described
- [ ] I have rebased on the latest main branch
- [ ] There are no merge conflicts
